hero.title: Hello I'm Santiago!
hero.job_title: Artificial Intelligence Engineer - Santiago Ponce Arrocha - Málaga, Spain.
hero.description: ML & Computer Vision Specialist | Automation & Generative AI & Natural Language

jobs_description.title: Freelance Developer
description: Do you have an idea or a technical challenge?

As a freelance developer, I specialize in transforming complex problems into efficient technological solutions. I combine custom software development with the power of Artificial Intelligence and automated workflow orchestration.

I am completely open to private projects and custom collaborations. If you have a specific business need or an idea you want to validate, write to me without any commitment. I'll be happy to hear your concerns and propose a viable technical solution before you decide anything.

I have experience developing automated management tools for real estate companies. A recent example is the development of Veronda: Veronda is an AI-powered solution designed to automate comprehensive invoice, receipt, and contract management.

jobs_description.title: Data Scientist - Computer Vision
description: Design and implementation in a CRM of an automated workflow using n8n to orchestrate an intelligent product and service chatbot, operating on multiple communication channels such as WhatsApp and other messaging platforms.

Participation in the development of a software platform for the real estate and construction sector, aimed at automating technical and urban validation of residential blueprints through computer vision and artificial intelligence models.

jobs_description.title: Researcher at University of Málaga - SCBI Picasso
jobs_description.description: Work carried out at SCBI Picasso, the supercomputing center of the University of Málaga. Design and implementation from scratch of a complete system for neural rendering and synthesis of new views of 3D scenes. Focus on learning 3D scenes from images using optimizable volumetric radiance field models (such as Gaussian Splatting), with the goal of generating new perspectives from arbitrary viewpoints.

projects.title: Veronda: Invoice, Receipt and Contract Management
projects.description: AI-powered solution designed to automate comprehensive invoice, receipt, and contract management using LLM and OCR models. Integrated with Google database and services for control and management of all documents.

projects.title: Neural Representation and Dynamic Segmentation for Novel View Generation in 3D Scenes
projects.description: Designed and implemented a complete system from scratch for neural rendering and innovative view synthesis of 3D scenes. This work focuses on learning 3D scenes from images using optimizable volumetric radiance field models (such as Gaussian Splatting), with the goal of generating new scene perspectives from arbitrary viewpoints.

projects.title: Antialiasing Techniques for Real-Time Games and 3D Scenes Using Deep Neural Networks
projects.description: The main objective of this project is to research, analyze and develop antialiasing techniques based on deep neural networks for application in video games. Multiple models have been developed using different architectures, such as CNN, UNet and Transformer.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio - Modern Design
description: Personal portfolio developed with Astro, showcasing AI and ML projects with modern design, performance optimization and multi-language support.
You can use it to create your own and show people what you're capable of!

contributions.title: Advanced Periodontics
contributions.description: Collaboration with marketing agency in Texas to create the website for Advanced Periodontics & Dental Implants clinic.

contributions.title: Ana Rangel UX Portfolio
contributions.description: Development of personal portfolio for UX designer Ana Rangel, focused on performance and modern design.

social_media.title: Social Media
social_media.subtitle: Follow me on social media for daily content about AI, Machine Learning and personal development

about.title: About me
about.subtitle: I'm resourceful, outgoing, I like Pokémon and bread with olive oil.
about.description:
I am an Artificial Intelligence engineer specialized in Machine Learning and Computer Vision. I consider myself an outgoing person with experience in public speaking and leadership skills: I enjoy guiding teams and managing projects collaboratively.

I'm passionate about applied AI: I design, train and deploy computer vision solutions and ML pipelines that solve real problems. I work with a practical and innovation-driven approach, always seeking efficient, reproducible, and production-oriented solutions.

I'm always open to new collaborations and challenges. If you're looking for someone reliable, creative, and committed to delivering high-quality work on AI projects, contact me and let's talk about your idea.

contact.title: Ready to bring your ideas to life?
contact.subtitle: I can boost your project or be part of your team
